attributes.action: put the grate bakc in great britian (england)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
since there is a real lack of petitions sujesting that imigrunts go back to there country, plese sign this if you agree that until we can freely puff fag smoke at a free-flying union jack whilst making asylem seekers work for five years wiv no pay be-4 they get a council house or right to a Gp or any food. 

this country was once grate with tteh empire and we could say what we wanted about foreigners all the time.  let's make it grate again like in those daze and be prowd to be english! 
   
thank you for giving me the chanse to offer my poynt of view.  if you could just approve one single petition about anti-imigrashun,it wil all be worth it.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
